fetch_objective: Cross-asset hourly OHLCV data for pooled training (target: 490K samples)

sol.status: PARTIAL - Limited by exchange data availability (SOL launched Sept 2020, earliest data from Feb 2021)

avax.status: INSUFFICIENT - No exchange provides historical data before Feb 2026 for AVAX
avax.note: Tried 7+ exchanges (Binance, OKX, Bybit, KuCoin, Gate, Huobi, MEXC) - none have deep historical data

matic.status: INSUFFICIENT - No exchange provides historical data before Feb 2026 for MATIC/POL
matic.note: MATIC rebranded to POL in 2024, but historical data not available on free exchanges

limitations.avax_historical_unavailable: Free exchange APIs do not provide AVAX historical data before Feb 2026
limitations.matic_historical_unavailable: Free exchange APIs do not provide MATIC/POL historical data before Feb 2026
limitations.sol_partial_coverage: SOL launched Sept 2020, but earliest available data is Feb 2021 (Bitfinex)
limitations.recommendation: For production use, consider: (1) Using only 6 complete assets (BTC, ETH, DOT, LINK, ADA, SOL) for cross-asset training, or (2) Purchasing historical data from CryptoCompare/Kaiko, or (3) Accepting reduced sample size (366K vs 490K target)

next_steps: Option 1: Proceed with 6-asset training (BTC, ETH, SOL, DOT, LINK, ADA) = 364,830 samples
Option 2: Drop SOL and use only 5 complete assets (BTC, ETH, DOT, LINK, ADA) = 335,110 samples
Option 3: Purchase historical data for AVAX/MATIC from premium provider
Option 4: Proceed with all 8 assets accepting limited coverage for AVAX/MATIC
